comments.content:
The attached patch adds the definitions for W3C's DeviceOrientation and DeviceMotion events.

The iOS specific attributes (DeviceOrientationEvent.webkitCompassAccuracy and DeviceOrientationEvent.webkitCompassHeading) are included as well.

Official spec: http://www.w3.org/TR/orientation-event/
This issue was closed by revision 2601aaf5ee5a.
